data.actual_result: The loading symbol and "100%" appears even after the image is fully loaded instead of disappearing when it's fully loaded
data.expected_result: Image fully loads and the loading symbol and "100%" don't appear afterwards
data.short_description: When viewing an image on poor connection the loading symbol and "100%" appears after the image is fully loaded
data.steps_to_repro: - Send an image in chat, or have someone send a message in chat - Tap on the image to view the image - Observe the image as it loads
